ThingDef.label: wolfsblood elixir
ThingDef.description:
An elixir made from distilled werewolf blood, the effect it has on the ingestors body depends on the advancement, or lack, of lycanthropy.

When ingested by those without any traces of lycanthropy, it will infect them with Sanies Lupinus.

When ingested by those that are currently infected by Sanies Lupinus, it will strengthen infection, increasing the severity of it.

When ingested by those with dormant lycanthropy, it will force a transformation. Progressing the disease into full lycanthropy, and also temporarily causing the ingestor to lose control of their new form.

When ingested by a lycanthrope, it will temporarily increase the amount of lycanthropic stress they can withstand while transformed.

When ingested by a transformed lycanthrope, it strengthens the transformation. Wound healing rate is greatly enhanced for a short period of time, or until the transformation ends.

HediffDef.label: wolfsblood adrenaline
HediffDef.description: A wolfsblood elixir active in ones bloodstream. Temporarily increase the amount of lycanthropic stress they can withstand while transformed.

HediffDef.label: wolfsblood regeneration
HediffDef.description: A wolfsblood elixir active in ones bloodstream. Temporarily increase the rate that wounds heal.
